name: Under Us (Giantblargg, vishnukey, HannahSloan)
description:
A spooky game made for the Alberta Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/albertagamejam

in 48hrs.

Art by: Zahra 3D Models and Programming by: Riley Baker Game Design and Programming: Hannah Sloan Player Programmer: Daniel Doran

Game Jam Theme: What Lies Beneath

Source Code: https://github.com/vishnukey/Under_Us
